sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Dialog } from '@headlessui/react'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import { XMarkIcon, PencilIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { Tenant } from '../../types/tenant'; interface TenantEditModalProps { isOpen: boolean; onClose: () => void; tenant: Tenant; onSubmit: (data: Partial) => Promise; } interface TenantEditForm { firstName: string; lastName: string; email: string; phone: string; dateOfBirth: string; employmentStatus: 'employed' | 'unemployed' | 'self-employed' | 'retired' | 'student'; employer: string; monthlyIncome: number; emergencyContactName: string; emergencyContactPhone: string; emergencyContactRelation: string; previousAddress: string; notes: string; status: 'active' | 'inactive' | 'pending'; moveInDate: string; moveOutDate: string; } const TenantEditModal: React.FC = ({ isOpen, onClose, tenant, onSubmit }) => { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const { register, handleSubmit, reset, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); useEffect(() => { if (isOpen && tenant) { reset({ firstName: tenant.firstName || '', lastName: tenant.lastName || '', email: tenant.email || '', phone: tenant.phone || '', dateOfBirth: (tenant.dateOfBirth || '').split('T')[0], employmentStatus: 'employed' as any, // Default since tenant type doesn't have this field employer: tenant.employment?.employer || '', monthlyIncome: tenant.employment?.monthlyIncome || 0, emergencyContactName: tenant.emergencyContact?.name || '', emergencyContactPhone: tenant.emergencyContact?.phone || '', emergencyContactRelation: tenant.emergencyContact?.relationship || '', previousAddress: '', // Not in tenant type notes: tenant.notes || '', status: (tenant.status || 'active') as any, moveInDate: (tenant.moveInDate || '').split('T')[0], moveOutDate: (tenant.moveOutDate || '').split('T')[0], }); } }, [isOpen, tenant, reset]); const handleFormSubmit = async (data: TenantEditForm) => { try { setLoading(true); const updateData: Partial = { id: tenant.id, firstName: data.firstName, lastName: data.lastName, email: data.email, phone: data.phone, dateOfBirth: data.dateOfBirth, employmentStatus: data.employmentStatus, employer: data.employer, monthlyIncome: data.monthlyIncome, emergencyContactName: data.emergencyContactName, emergencyContactPhone: data.emergencyContactPhone, emergencyContactRelation: data.emergencyContactRelation, previousAddress: data.previousAddress, notes: data.notes, status: data.status, moveInDate: data.moveInDate, moveOutDate: data.moveOutDate, }; await onSubmit(updateData); onClose(); } catch (error) { console.error('Error updating tenant:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (!isOpen) return null; return (
